attributes.action: Radically change the tax system making it simpler, fairer, cheaper to administer, understand and is acceptable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Half of our salary goes to the treasury in some form of tax. Income tax also does not take into account normal living expenses. Ontop of income tax, we pay:

1. National Insurance even when we pay for private medical insurance.
2. Council tax
3. Tax on petrol when commuting
4. Road Tax
5. Tax on uility bills
6. Tax on purchasing products like a fridge/freezer 
7. Tax on professional services like advice on pension/financial matters.
8. Tax on insurance policies.

There are more..

We just want more money in our pockets that we have rightly earned from working hard, without having to fill out tax relief forms etc which makes everything complicated, has little effect and more often giving false hope.
